pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Simple Python loggerA simple logger for console/file logging with duplicate logs filter support## Release new version### requirements* Export GitHub token```bashexport GITHUB_TOKEN=<your_github_token>```* [release-it](https://github.com/release-it/release-it)```bashsudo npm install --global release-itnpm install --save-dev @release-it/bumper```### usage* Create a release```bashgit pullrelease-it # Follow the instructions```## Usage```pythonfrom simple_logger.logger import get_loggerlogger = get_logger(name=__name__, level=logging.DEBUG, filename="my-log.log")logger.info("This is INFO log")```
